item.description:
It's a song!

It's a movie!

It's a... restaurant?!

Well, you didn't really expect anything else, did you...?

As you may have guessed, we're talking about Mia Regazza on Route 18 in Abington, which opened to good reviews early in 2008 and has been on Mike's "To Try" list ever since.

According to a Patriot Ledger article, owners John and Kristin Martin intended the name to be an allusion to the Italian phrase "le mie ragazze" ("my girls"), referring to the three girls in their own family as well as their intention to create a place where families can feel at home (and apparently to a belief that the dining public on the South Shore is not ready to cope with Italian plurals, but we digress...)

A look at their online menu reveals a good selection of Italian and American favorites, as well as some less common but welcome offerings, like Pork Osso Bucco ($19.99) and New Zealand Rack of Lamb ($21.99). We hope that choices like that will make YOUR choice easy, and that you'll join us at 7:00 pm on Thursday, November 18th, to meet the Martin's newest girl.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Mia Regazza
287 Washington St. (Route 18)
Abington, MA 02351
781-871-5800
Website: Mia Regazza

Organizer: Mike

Guests: Yes. Two per member allowed. For questions about exceptions, please contact Mike.

Price Range: Most entrees are under $19.00, with several selections priced at just $12.99 and New Zealand Rack of Lamb alone at the high water mark of $21.99. Grilled pizzettas start at $6.99 (8 inch) and $9.99 (12 inch) and go up as you add toppings. A good selection of sandwiches mostly falls into the $7.99 - $9.99 range.

Event Fee: Current Annual Members - None, Group Members - $2.00, Guests - $2.00

Cash Only Policy: Please bring cash! Paying for all of our meals in cash has been SSDOMG'S policy for over four years. It allows us to avoid the confusion of having the waitstaff run multiple credit card slips and generally helps to keep things simpler for everyone.

RSVP Deadline: Wednesday, November 17th @ 7:00 pm. Any changes made after this time may not be seen by the Event Organizer. Changes to "No" after the deadline will be considered No-Shows per our guidelines on the About Us page.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Directions: (Credit to Mia Regazza website): Mia Regazza is located at 287 Washington St. in Abington, MA right on route 18.

From RT 3: Take exit 16 for route 18 south and follow into Abington. Mia Regazza will be on your right about an 1/8 of a mile after you cross over RT 123 before Strawberry Valley Golf Course.
item.how_to_find_us: Our reservation is under both 'Mike' and 'South Shore Meetup Group'.

group.name: The South Shore Dining Out Meetup Group

item.name: My Girl!
